About the policy: An innovation policy by Star health dedicated to diabetic persons that covers diabetic, regular hospitalization & out patient expenses
Eligibility: Person with Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes. Only 2A avialable for husband and wife - any one must be diabetic
Medical screening: Plan A is must. Plan B - No Medical screening
Cover from Day 1 - for diabetic complica: Plan A: All diabetic complications covered from Day 1. Plan B: Cover from Day - 31st - for diabetic complications(except for cardio vascular, Renal/ Eye/ Foot ulcer)
Sublimit for cardio - vascular complicat: Plan A: No sublimit. Plan B: Sublimit for cardio - vascular complications
Premium: Plan A: Premium is lower. Plan B: Premium is higher
Medical screening for every entry: Plan A: Medical screening for every entry. Plan B: No medical screening even for fresh entry aged >50
Outpatient benefits: Plan A: Higher outpatient benefits. Plan B: Slightly less outpatient benefits
Pre hospitalization: 30 days prior to date of hospitalization
Post hospitalization: 60 days from date of discharge (7% of hospitalization expenses max Rs 5000)
Donor Expenses coverage: Kidney Transplantation donor Screening and Post Donation Complications of the donor not covered
Dialysis Expenses coverage: @ Rs 1000 per sitting upto 24 months from the month of dialysis recommendation
Cost of Artifical Limbs: On Amputation – upto 10% of Sum Insured – if Amputation surgery claim is admitted
Sub limit of Cardio vascular: Plan A: No sublimit. Plan B: 3 Lac, 4 Lac, 5 Lac, 10 Lac
Cataract limits: Per Eye - Rs 20,000; Per policy period Rs 30,000 (for 3/4 Lac SI). Per Eye - Rs 30,000; Per policy period - Rs 40,000 (for 5/10 Lac SI)
Personal Accidental Cover: Death sum insured equal to health sum insured & covers accidental death
Outpatient: Rs 750 per hospitalization and Rs 1500 per policy year, Blood test cost is reimbursed
Automatic restoration: 100 % Sum insured when basic sum insured is exhausted. Can be used for non-diabetic related hospitalization only, Available in individual policies.
Modern Treatments: Based on the sum insured chosen limits vary

Waiting period - Hospitalization Diabete.For hospitalization not related to Cardi: Plan A: 30 days. Plan B: No waiting period
Waiting period - Hospitalization Diabete.For hospitalization related to Cardio Va: Plan A: 12 months. Plan B: No waiting period
Waiting period - Hospitalization Diabete.Any Transplant related Surgery: Plan A: 24 months. Plan B: No waiting period
